text: Škrilje () is a village in the Municipality of Ig in central Slovenia. The municipality is part of the traditional region of Inner Carniola and is now included in the Central Slovenia Statistical Region.Ig municipal site The site of an Iron Age fortified settlement has been found on Stražar Hill west of the settlement on a strategic point above the Iška Gorge.Slovenian Ministry of Culture register of national heritage reference number ešd 21055 ==References== ==External links== *Škrilje on Geopedia * Category:Populated places in the Municipality of Ig
title: Škrilje, Ig
